name: Arduino-product-counter
body:
## Process Control via Arduino

Charting Starbucks sandwich [throughput](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Throughput_%28business%29) with an arduino, an ultrasonic-rangefinder, and Excel (I wouldn't do this in Excel now, but at the time, I was new to programming and vba was the only language I was familiar with.) 

This device proved quite useful in new product rollouts.

[![ScreenShot](https://raw.github.com/dylan-conlin/arduino-product-counter/master/arduino-video-image.png)](http://youtu.be/cB_xQYNlEa0)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
